name: Henry INC.
overview:
Founded in 2005, by Henry Dâ€™Andrea, Henry INC has grown to be a large company online and off.

Corporate Employees

Henry Dâ€™Andrea- President, Founder

History of Henry INC.

In late 2008, Henry Dâ€™Andrea started a technology blog, thehenry.net. It has since then changed to Henry Dâ€™Andreas personal website,blog. thehenry.net has had a huge success, and it still online today.

Apptacious In March 2009, Henry founded the iPhone app review site, Apptacious. Which was owned by Henry INC. Henry was the President of Apptacious, until August 10, 2009. When Henry Dâ€™Andrea resigned as President, and sold Apptacious to Shawn Osborne. Henry INC. is no longer associated with Apptacious in any way.

The Tech Update In February 2010, Henry INC. founded the Popular Technology News Site, The Tech Update. Since then, The Tech Update has been featured on sites such as the WSJ, Barrons and Macrumors. Henry Dâ€™Andrea is also the current President of The Tech Update, and plans to keep his position as long as the site is online. It is the most successful site Henry INC. has ever launched.

AppVizzle In May 2010, Henry INC. ventured into the iPhone App Store. Creating over 5 apps for both the iPhone and iPad. The apps have been downloaded more than 50,000 times. It has been a huge success for Henry INC, and they will continue to create more. On September 8 2010, Henry INC. renamed Henry INC Mobile to AppVizzle. s

Henry INC. currently owns The Tech Update, Tech Scramble, and AppVizzle.
